archery.description: Each level of this skill adds to the characteru"\u0027"s POI when making attacks with bows.

crossbow.description: Each level of this skill adds to the characteru"\u0027"s POI when making attacks with crossbows.

great_weapon.description: Each level of this skill adds to the characteru"\u0027"s PRW when making attacks with great weapons. Some great weapons require two hands to wield. A character cannot wield more than one great weapon at a time.

hand_weapon.description: Each level of this skill adds to the characteru"\u0027"s PRW when making attacks with melee hand weapons.

lance.description: Each level of this skill adds to the characteru"\u0027"s PRW when making attacks with lance weapons. A character cannot wield another lance or great weapon while wielding a lance.

light_artillery.description: The character is knowledgeable in the operation, loading, and transport of light artillery weapons. Each level of this skill adds to the characteru"\u0027"s POI when making attacks with light artillery.

pistol.description: Each level of this skill adds to the characteru"\u0027"s POI when making attacks with pistols.

rifle.description: Each level of this skill adds to the characteru"\u0027"s POI when making attacks with rifles.

shield.description: Each level of this skill adds to the characteru"\u0027"s PRW when making attacks with a shield. Additionally, a character armed with a shield gains +1 ARM for each level of the Shield skill he has against attacks originating in his front arc. This bonus is not cumulative with additional shields.

thrown_weapon.description: Each level of this skill adds to the characteru"\u0027"s PRW when making attacks with thrown weapons or slings.

unarmed_combat.description: Each level of this skill adds to the characteru"\u0027"s PRW when making attacks with his bare hands.
